EmailTemplate.name: AeroVue Survey 2015.Survey Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: AeroVue Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387> <http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Shape the Future of Avionics As a turboprop aircraft operator, you are invited to participate in an online survey on future avionics functionality. Your feedback will help shape future flight deck upgrade offerings in this exciting part of the aerospace marketplace.
Survey participants are automatically eligible to win one of two Apple iPads! Complete the survey before March 18th to enter your name twice. The drawing will be conducted on Friday, April 10.
{{lead.Survey Link URL:default=}}
Thank you for your time and valuable feedback!
Survey links are individualized. Any who wish to participate can do so by sending a request to AEROsurveyadmin@Honeywell.com <mailto:AEROsurveyadmin@Honeywell.com>.
The online survey should take about 20 minutes to complete. Individual responses will be kept confidential. To take the survey, simply click the link above. Additional terms and conditions may apply; full rules and exclusions are available here <http://aerovueupgrade.cloudssi.com/Web%20Upload/graphics/AeroVueSurveyRules.htm>. Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2014 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
